page.title: 20VAGARIES OF THE LAW
page.content:
THERE IS NOT A LOT OF DEVIANCY FROM THE LAWS OF THE LAND, AND THE AREA IS POLICED BY THE LOCAL CONSTABULARY, WHO MAY BE SUMMONED BY TELEPHONING 999 WHEN TROUBLE OCCURS. {THEFTS AND BURGLARIES}ARE NOT UNKNOWN, BUT THEIR FREQUENCY IS LESS THAN IN THE CITY. THERE ARE SOME ACTS OF{VANDALISM EVIDENT WHICH PARTICULARLY ANNOY THE OLDER, VILLAGE OCCUPANTS. THESE ARE OFTEN CAUSED BY A SMALL MINORITY OF THE LOCAL YOUTHS. VARIOUS THEORIES ARE SUGGESTED AS TO WHY THIS OCCURS, THE MOST COMMON ONE RELATING TO THE HIGH LEVELS OF{UNEMPLOYMENT}AND THE LACK OF PROSPECTS OPEN TO THE YOUNG.
* * * * * * THIS SURVEY WAS CONDUCTED BY THE PUPILS AND STAFF OF HORSFORD MIDDLE SCHOOL.
